main event: On 26 February 1963, a metallic object approximately 8 to 10 feet in diameter was observed by eight military personnel at Lajes, Azores.
interesting points: The object was maneuverable and traveled at a speed of 20-30 knots,It was initially observed moving from east to west before returning in the opposite direction,The sighting was confirmed by eight military personnel,The object emitted no sound and left no trail or exhaust,The case was evaluated as unidentified.
